attributes.name: The Lounge of a Thousand Whispers

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUROAPBoZg3iv5Z64_description
attribs.current: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUThblFhMVq6N2LGj_description
attribs.current: The next attack roll made against this target before the end of the priest's next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUThblFhMVq6N2LGk_description
attribs.current: The priest, as a bonus action, creates a floating, spectral weapon within 60 feet that lasts for one minute or until the priest casts this spell again. When the priest casts the spell, it can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. As a bonus action on the priest's turn, it can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGUThdTprSjqqfLsIY_description
attribs.current: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGUThdTprSjqqfLsIZ_description
attribs.current: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:   • Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy • 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary • 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon • 3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGUU4o3O3nF-3DgSFV_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGUU4o3O3nF-3DgSFV_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGUU4pU0dUhD4Zwo7M_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGUU4pU0dUhD4Zwo7M_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGUU4pU0dUhD4Zwo7N_spelldescription
attribs.current: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range: Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGUU4qCbCQlxQzqUDo_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGUU4qCbCQlxQzqUDo_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVM_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVM_spelldescription
attribs.current: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVM_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVN_spelldescription
attribs.current: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This spell doesn’t protect the warded creature from area effects, such as the explosion of a fireball. If the warded creature makes an attack, casts a spell that affects an enemy creature, or deals damage to another creature, this spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVO_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVP_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVP_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell’s effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVQ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you automatically end the effects of a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you used.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVQ_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell’s level. On a successful check, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGUU4rcy55ouOLeoVQ_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature, object, or magical effect within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGUU4sPwlgy9geiyzE_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGUU4sPwlgy9geiyzE_spelldescription
attribs.current: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish. When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creature’s speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUWTr-9Ol5IZdXeNj_description
attribs.current: On hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUWTs0QbUREuatlzT_description
attribs.current: The mechanism that powers the hound explodes when the construct is destroyed. All creatures within 5 feet of the hound take 7 (2d6) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGUWTs0QbUREuatlzU_description
attribs.current: The clockwork hound is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGUWTtwpZwB4QQmfV5_description
attribs.current: The clockwork hound has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGUWTtwpZwB4QQmfV6_description
attribs.current: Clockwork hounds are designed to guard areas and track prey. They have advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks when tracking.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current:
charmed, exhaustion, 
frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUsTZiZYwyFq-Y492_description
attribs.current: The pitboss makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUsTZiZYwyFq-Y495_name
attribs.current: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGUsTZiZYwyFq-Y495_description
attribs.current: For 1 minute, the pitboss can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the pitboss. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the pitboss is incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-MUGUsTaMe5-xlFVdJnd_description
attribs.current: The pitboss adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGUsTaMe5-xlFVdJne_description
attribs.current: The pitboss has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGWRGmDAmz6LfZ1AXz_description
attribs.current: A ratfolk rogue can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGWRGmDAmz6LfZ1AY-_description
attribs.current: A ratfolk rogue can move through the space of any creature size Medium or larger.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGWRGmDAmz6LfZ1AY0_description
attribs.current: A ratfolk rogue has advantage on its attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ratfolk’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally is capable of attacking.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGWRGmDAmz6LfZ1AY1_description
attribs.current: A ratfolk rogue deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of one of its allies that isn’t incapacitated and the rogue doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGXUf6xYYtdiguISzS_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon makes two attacks: two pick attacks or two slam attacks, or one of each.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGXUf7fHnN21mwQJEW_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon can spew a jet of alchemical fire in a line 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Any creature in the path of the jet takes 26 (4d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGXUf7fHnN21mwQJEX_description
attribs.current: As a bonus action, the clockwork myrmidon’s chest can fire a spray of alchemical grease with a range of 30 feet, covering a 10-by-10 foot square area and turning it into difficult terrain. Each creature standing in the affected area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGXUf7fHnN21mwQJEY_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon’s alchemical flame reservoir explodes when the construct is destroyed, spraying nearby creatures with burning fuel. A creature within 5 feet of the myrmidon takes 19 (3d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. This explosion doesn’t occur if the clockwork myrmidon has already fired its alchemical flame jet four times.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGXUf7fHnN21mwQJEZ_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQoGwS4Nt4wPr7Ud_description
attribs.current:
The hostess is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The hostess knows the following bard spells:
Cantrips (at will): mending, prestidigitation
1st level (4 slots): charm person, comprehend languages, sleep, unseen servant
2nd level (2 slots): calm emotions, hold person

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQoGwS4Nt4wPr7Ue_description
attribs.current: The hostess makes two melee attacks with her dagger.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQoGwS4Nt4wPr7Uf_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +0, Range reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target
